document_data.name: Seven Seedlings of the Verdant Sages
document_data.mainbody: The '''''seven seedlings of the verdant sages''''' were a group of mythical immature offspring of the most ancient and wisest [[treants]] of [[the North]] known of in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
In [[1369 DR]], adventurers hired by [[Celerum|Celerum the Black]] disturbed a stone circle in a sacred druidic grove; in reality, it was the crumbled wall of the lost [[Accursed Tower]] of [[Damien Morienus]]. 

The druids confronted the adventurers and tasked them with finding the ''seven seedlings of the verdant sages'' and returning them to restore the holiness of the grove and the stone circle.
